name: Keep The Change (TheLastVicaris)
description:
People are thirsty and you're the only one who can save them from this suffering.

Clients will approach the bar's counter and ask for a drink, you can then grab the drink from the shelves or grab a beer from the tap. Run to them and give them the drink before they get bored and leave. 

You will also want to receive the full payment from some clients in the cashier at the rightmost part of the counter but this will take an extra time

... how much money can you make?

My first game submitted for the 'My First Game Jam: Summer 2020'

Please destroy my game with your feedback, I don't want to get just good, I want to get really good at making games.

And of course, enjoy! :)
